EmailTemplate.name: LI Additional Information Needed
EmailTemplate.subject: ASSOCIATING YOUR LICENSE
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear License Holder,
The information required to associate your license is as follows: Activity License #: XXXX City of Philadelphia Tax Account #: XXXX Social Security Number (SSN) OR Employer Identification Number (EIN): XXXX
Select ‘commercial’ when prompted for license type. Once your account is associated, you will have access to your other licenses.
Please reply to this email if you experience any further issues related to this. We appreciate your patience and thank you for your investment in the City of Philadelphia.
Sincerely, Customer Care Staff Department of L & I
